begin() → {ODatabaseTransaction}

Begin a transaction in this database session.

Begin a transaction in this database session. ODatabaseSession supports only 1 transaction at time. Use multiple sessions if you want to run concurrent transactions.

Source:
  • database/database.js, line 61
Returns:

The new transaction

Type
ODatabaseTransaction

close() → {Promise}

Close the database session.

Close the database session. If the session is pooled, the instance is returned to the pool, leaving the session open on the server. Otherwhise the session is closed permanently on the server.

Source:
  • database/database.js, line 346
Returns:
